dct_description_sm: Important religious, political, and historical buildings and sites, tourist attractions are located. On verso: The Old city of Jerusalem (scale 1:3,800) -- Shopping center of Jerusalem (scale 1:4,800). Includes street names index. Note: "Roads continuing into the margin beyond the asterisk are no longer drawn to scale. They are designed schematically to indicate the best way of reaching buildings or monuments appearing in the margin."
